long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The MultiVu Chat for Quickbase is a proprietary extension for Google Chrome. It is intended for private use by MultiVu, a brand of Cision US Inc. This extension uses the API for the Quickbase platform to provide a comprehensive place for their employees to chat and attach files to appropriate records in their Quickbase applications.

When enabled, it will only work on prnewswire.quickbase.com and will require a MultiVu administrator to set up each user in their Chat Configuration application. After proper setup, users will utilize the tool for conversations and sharing files as they associate to records in their business applications.
